729746f-a.title: Richmond: Todt Hill Road - Ocean Terrace
729746f-a.text:
Todt Hill Road, east side, slightly south of Ocean Terrace, showing the house and pond on the
David J. Tysen Estate.
About 1910
By Miulford Simonson
From P. . Sperr Collection
729746f-a.folder: Todt Hill Road & Ocean Terrace, Staten Island, NY

729147f-a.title: Richmond: Todt Hill Road - Ocean Terrace
729147f-a.text:
Mersereau Valley (Staten lIsland): A panoramic view of the valley looking northeastward from Todt Hill Road and Ocean Terrace. The Valley is the hollow fronting Todt Hill. View 3 is in a southeasterly direction and shows part of Dongan Hill.
1924
Views 1,2,3
P. L. Sperr
729147f-a.folder: Todt Hill Road & Ocean Terrace, Staten Island, NY

729242f-b.title: Richmond: Ocean Terrace - Todt Hill Road
729242f-b.text:
Ocean Terrace, near Todt Hill Road, showing three winter scenes. This is a set of three views taken in
the same area, the same day.
February 22, 1927
P. L. Sperr
729242f-b.folder: Ocean Terrace & Todt Hill Road, Staten Island, NY

729745f-b.title: Richmond: Todt Hill Road - Ocean Terrace
729745f-b.text:
Todt Hill Road, south from near Ccean Terrace, showing the
area in its winter setting (view 2).
View 1 is at Merrick Avenue, not far from Ocean Terrace, and shows the highest point on the Atlantic coast from Maine to Florida,
the elevation being 409.8 feet.
View 1: August 9, 1926
View 2: February 22, 1927
P. L. Sperr
729745f-b.folder: Todt Hill Road & Ocean Terrace, Staten Island, NY
